title: Victor M. Castro, FAMIA
text: Victor Castro is a Principal Data Scientist at Mass General Brigham and a Ph.D. student in Population Health at Northeastern University. His current research interests include Long COVID phenotyping, developing methods for characterizing neuropsychiatric symptoms in large real-world datasets and understanding the impact of health disparities on population health research.
